venue: Seattle Children's PlayGarden, 1745 24th Ave S, Seattle, WA 98144
steps: Introduction and explanation of the gardening activity.
Distribution of gardening tools and materials.
Guided planting of flowers and vegetables.
Watering plants and learning about plant care.
Wrap up with a sensory activity like making a mud pie.
safety: Ensure children wear sun protection and stay hydrated. Adult supervision is required at all times.
